result.reason: The infrastructure for dynamic folders exists (`DynamicFolderManager`, `ContainerInfo.DynamicSource`) but currently only supports Active Directory. This feature request implies extending it to other sources (e.g., generic scripts, files, or URL) to make it truly dynamic for all users.
result.approach: Extend `DynamicSourceType` enum with new sources (e.g., `Script`, `File`). Update `DynamicFolderManager.RefreshFolderInternal` to handle these new types by invoking the appropriate importer or script parser to populate `ContainerInfo.Children`.
